alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:26PM EDT until July 14 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR KENNEBEC COUNTY... At 326 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belgrade, or 8 miles southwest of Oakland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Waterville, Fairfield, Gardiner, Oakland, China, Clinton, Belgrade, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell, Palermo, Winthrop, Benton, Chelsea, Albion, Fayette, Windsor, Pittston and Rome. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 105 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
